title: Nautilus Support Ranked Commentary

embed.description: More support matches coming soon. Feel free to comment or ask questions! Runes 9x Greater Mark of Armor 9x Greater Seal of Scaling Health 9x Greater GLyph of Scaling Magic Resist 3x Greater Quintessence of Armor Masteries: 0/9/21 (Nautilus really needs the speed from the Utility tree)

body:
Hi guys,

First time I've recorded a game with live commentary. Hope you enjoy!

Any feedback is greatly appreciated.

replies.body: As a person who loves watching league videos, your videos are quite educational, as i am placed in support a lot it helps to look at people who do it well and learn, content - 8 educational - 9 entertaining - 4/5 (personally for me 6-7 but most people would find it quite normal to watch) hope this helps and continue to make awesome videos like that :D

Cheers mate!

By voicing my thoughts I was hoping to give people some insight as to why I make certain decisions ingame. So awesome to hear someone actually say it was educational.

If there's enough interest you can expect more videos like this starring other (support/jungle) champions.

Thanks for the feedback dude; much appreciated!
any time my friend :D I'm glad my input was taken to heart :D i hope things work out with your youtube, btw what rank are you?
